definition: to cut open the abdomen/to disembowel/to speak from the heart
lit. cutting one's stomach to hide a pearl (idiom)/fig. wasting a lot of effort on trivialities

sentences.english: The bans only affect planned caesareans, not c-sections which are carried out for emergency reasons.
sentences.chinese: 該禁令只有計劃的剖腹產，緊急的剖腹產不列。

sentences.english: The bans only affect planned caesareans, not c-sections which are carried out for emergency reasons.
sentences.chinese: 該禁令只有計劃的剖腹產，緊急的剖腹產不列。

sentences.english: You have had 2 cesareans before, but you have also had a vaginal delivery.
sentences.chinese: 你有兩次剖腹產，但也有一次順產經歷。

sentences.english: At 30 weeks, Mrs. Goodrich had an emergency caesarean.
sentences.chinese: 第30周時，古德里奇太太進行了人工剖腹產。

sentences.english: The baby girl is Thomas' first child. Beatie said the baby was not delivered via C-section.
sentences.chinese: 托馬斯說，這個孩子並非剖腹生產。

sentences.english: A recent study finds C-sections may be a contributing to babies being born too early.
sentences.chinese: 最近一項研究發現剖腹產使嬰兒過早出生。

sentences.english: The hernia defects were repaired through laparotomy and laparoscopy respectively.
sentences.chinese: 膈疝可分別應用剖腹手術或腹腔鏡進行修補。

sentences.english: After surgical intervention the fetal sheep continued on its gestation.
sentences.chinese: 術後母綿羊繼續妊娠，待足月後行剖腹產取胎羊。

sentences.english: Abortion and caesarian section are widely used for non - medical or non - lifesaving reasons.
sentences.chinese: 墮胎和剖腹產手術被廣泛地用於非醫或非救生的原因。

sentences.english: A laparotomy was performed and the tumor was resected.
sentences.chinese: 遂行剖腹探查及腫瘤切除。

sentences.english: Is Caesarian Section covered by the Obstetric Package service?
sentences.chinese: 產科套餐是否包括剖腹生產服務？

sentences.english: And if a natural birth would pose a health risk for mother or baby, a c-section would be allowed.
sentences.chinese: 如果順產會威脅母嬰健康，允許進行剖腹產。

sentences.english: Disappointed beauty rich son pou stomach suicide.
sentences.chinese: 失望的美富子剖腹自殺。

sentences.english: Before the introduction of antisepsis, laparotomy was not usually performed.
sentences.chinese: 在抗菌法發明以前，剖腹手術是不常做的。

sentences.english: A man could carry an embryo and have it delivered by caesarean section .
sentences.chinese: 男人可以懷胎，並以剖腹生產的方式，把嬰兒生下來。

sentences.english: I was with Mammaw and Papaw when Mother delivered by caesarean section.
sentences.chinese: 母親剖腹生弟弟時，我同老外婆和外公待在一起。

definition: to give birth without complications/easy childbirth/safe delivery/natural birth (without surgical operation)
to become pregnant/to carry a child in the womb
harakiri (formal Japanese: seppuku), a samurai's suicide by disemboweling
(of an expectant mother) to be in labor
